headline: Xylem to Release Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results on July 31, 2025
summary: WASHINGTON, July 01, 2025--Xylem Inc. (NYSE: XYL), a leading global water solutions company that empowers customers and communities to build a more water-secure world, will release its second quarter 2025 results at 6:55 a.m. (ET) on July 31, 2025. At 9:00 a.m. (ET), Xylem’s senior management team will host a conference call with investors.
